import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useRouter } from 'next/router' import styles from './styles/header.module.css' import { Button } from 'antd' import { UserOutlined, ShoppingCartOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons' import firebase from '../firebaseConfig' import User from './user' const Header = () => { const router = useRouter() const [toggleNavBar, setToggleNavBar] = useState(false) const navBarStyleItem = (route, name) => { if(router.pathname === route) { return

router.push(route)}>{name}

} else { return

router.push(route)}>{name}

} } const toggle = () => { setToggleNavBar(!toggleNavBar) } return (
{navBarStyleItem("/", "TIENDA")}
{navBarStyleItem("/nosotros", "NOSOTROS")}
{navBarStyleItem("/contacto", "CONTACTO")}
{/* */}
toggle()}/>
{toggleNavBar &&
{navBarStyleItem("/", "TIENDA")}
{navBarStyleItem("/nosotros", "NOSOTROS")}
{navBarStyleItem("/contacto", "CONTACTO")}
}
); } export default Header
